email.description: The email address of the account owning person

password.description: The password of the account owning person

optin.description: If the account owner would like to receive notifications via email

isPublic.description: If the session created after create account is a public session

alarms.description: The list of alarms in the current state

triggers.description: The triggers associated with the newly added alarm.

method.description: How the user (actor header) cancelled the alarm(s)

alarms.description: The list of alarms that have been cancelled

accountId.description: The account id of the device

placeId.description: The place id of the device

accountId.description: The account identifier of the hub requesting synchronization

placeId.description: The place identifier of the hub requesting synchronization

reflexVersion.description: The version of hub local reflexes currently supported by the hub

devices.description: A base64 encoded and gzipped json list of SyncDeviceInfo objects

DevicesDegraded.description: Emitted by the hub to driver services when the hub detects that the degraded state of some devices has changed

bundleNames.description: The set of bundles to load, if null or empty all bundles will be loaded

locale.description: The locale to load the localized strings, if not provided or is empty en-US will be used

deviceType.description: The type of device to search for

sn.description: The serial number of the device the user would register with

protocolAddress.description: The protocol address of the device to forcibly remove

DeviceClaimed.description: Issued from the IPCD Service to the IPCD Briges(s)/SAD Server when a device has been claimed

DeviceRegistered.description: Issued from the IPCD Service to the IPCD Bridge(s)/SAD Server when a device has been fully registered (i.e. has a driver)

DeviceUnregistered.description: Issued from the IPCD Service to the IPCD Bridge(s)/SAD Server when a device has been unregistered

DeviceConnected.description: Issued from the IPCD Bridge(s)/SAD Server when a device comes online.  The source should be the specific IPCD bridge/SAD Server

DeviceDisconnected.description: Issued from the IPCD Bridge(s)/SAD Server when a device goes offline.  The source should be the specific IPCD bridge/SAD Server

DeviceHeartBeat.description: Issued from the IPCD Bridge(s)/SAD Server with the protocol addresses of all online devices

stateCode.description: 2 or 3 char state or territory postal code from the NWS SAME Code database
2 or 3 char state or territory postal code from the NWS SAME Code database

county.description: county name specific to weather station as listed in the NWS SAME Code database

email.description: The email address of the person

method.description: The method by which the user will be notified of their reset token

email.description: The email address of the person

token.description: The token the user received via email or ivr

placeId.description: Optional identifier or the place to validate

streetAddress.description: If specified this address will be validated instead of the default place address.

place.description: The place whose population should be used for getting the product catalog
The place whose population should be used for getting the categories
The place whose population should be used for getting the brands
The place whose population should be used for getting the products
The place whose population should be used for getting the products
The place whose population should be used for getting the products

include.description: Type of product catalog entries to include, defaults to BROWSEABLE.

place.description: The place whose population should be used for finding the products
The place whose population should be used for getting the product
The place address to load the settings for

state.description: The US postal service 2 character state code (such as KS, CA, NY).

placeId.description: The id of the place to list the schedulers for.

includeWeekdays.description: if the results should include schedule for each day of the week.  Default value is true.

target.description: The address of the thing to schedule.
The address of the thing to schedule.

commandId.description: The id of the command to fire

target.description: The address of the thing to schedule.

group.description: The group for the schedules if they are being created.  If they already exist and are part of a different group, this will return an error

commands.description: A list of commands to insert/update/delete.  The referenced schedule ids will be created if needed.  If the id is null this will be considered an insert, if the id is populated and there are days this will be an update, if there is an id and no days it will be a delete.

target.description: The address of the thing to schedule.

schedule.description: The name of the schedule to update or create.

days.description: The days of the week that this command should be run on.  There must be at least one day in this set.

mode.description: What mode this command is scheduled in:     ABSOLUTE - The time reported in time will be used.     SUNRISE - The command will execute at local sunrise + offsetMin.  The time reported in the time field will be the calculated run time for today.     SUNSET - The command will execute at local sunset + offsetMin. The time reported in the time field will be the calculated run time for today.

time.description: The time of day formatted as HH:MM using a 24-hour clock, in place-local time (see Place#TimeZone), that the command should be sent.

offsetMinutes.description: This will always be 0 if the mode is set to ABSOLUTE.  If mode is set to SUNRISE or SUNSET this will be the offset / delta from sunrise or sunset that the event should run at.  A negative number means the event should happen before sunrise/sunset, a postive means after.

messageType.description: Default: base:SetAttributes. Type of message to be sent.

attributes.description: The attributes to send with the request.

target.description: The address of the thing being scheduled.

schedule.description: The name of the schedule being modified.

commandId.description: The id of the command to update. Only the specified fields will be changed.

days.description: If specified it will update the schedule to only run on the requested days.

mode.description: What mode this command is scheduled in:     ABSOLUTE - The time reported in time will be used.     SUNRISE - The command will execute at local sunrise + offsetMin.  The time reported in the time field will be the calculated run time for today.     SUNSET - The command will execute at local sunset + offsetMin. The time reported in the time field will be the calculated run time for today.

time.description: The time of day formatted as HH:MM using a 24-hour clock, in place-local time (see Place#TimeZone), that the command should be sent.

offsetMinutes.description: This will always be 0 if the mode is set to ABSOLUTE.  If mode is set to SUNRISE or SUNSET this will be the offset / delta from sunrise or sunset that the event should run at.  A negative number means the event should happen before sunrise/sunset, a postive means after.

messageType.description: Default: base:SetAttributes. Type of message to be sent.

attributes.description: If specified it will update the attributes to be included in the message.

target.description: The address of the thing being scheduled.

schedule.description: The name of the schedule being modified.

commandId.description: The id of the command to update. Only the specified fields will be changed.

placeId.description: The id of the place to activate

category.description: The category for the log message

code.description: A unique code for the event that happened

name.description: The name of the analytic event

context.description: Additional data associated with the event

ActivePlaceCleared.description: Emitted when the client bridge clears the current active place for a session

SessionExpired.description: Emitted when the user is manually or automatically logged out and the shiro session is destroyed

critera.description: The string to use for searching

from.description: starting point for results to return

limit.description: The maximum number of sessions to return (defaults to 50)

token.description: The token from a previous query to use for retrieving the next set of results

all.description: List all recordings, including ones marked for deletion but not yet deleted

type.description: Type of recording. Required to be one of the following ANY, STREAM, or RECORDING

limit.description: max number of recordings per page.

token.description: Token value to start the current page.  It should come from the nextToken value from the previous response.

all.description: Default: false If specified and set to true all recordings, including ones marked for deletion but not yet deleted will be returned

inprogress.description: Default: true If specified and set to false inprogress recordings / streams will not be shown.  Note that inprogress=false AND type=STREAM will always return an empty result.

type.description: Type of recording.              ANY - Will return streams and recordings, this should not generally be used.             STREAM - Will return only streams, useful for attempting to piggy-back on an existing stream.             RECORDING - Will return only recordings, some may still be in progress and therefore missing information like duration.

latest.description: No recordings that occur after this value will be returned. Since recordings are returned in descending order by time, recordings at the start of the list will be closer to this time.  Note if both token and latest are specified the earlier of the two values will be used.

earliest.description: No recordings that occur before this value will be returned. Since recordings are returned in descending order by time, recordings at the end of the list will be closer to this time.

cameras.description: Default: [] If specified, only recordings generated by the cameras in this set will be returned.  If not specified -or- the empty set, then all recordings will be returned regardless of camera.

tags.description: Default: [] If specified, only recordings with *ANY* of the given tags will be included.  If not specified -or- the empty set, then all recordings will be returned regardless of tags.

stream.description: True to start live streaming, false to start recording.

duration.description: The duration to record in seconds.  If not provided the default duration of 20 minutes will be used

includeFavorites.description: True if favorite recordings should be deleted also.

RecordingsDeleted.description: Emitted when all recordings for a place are deleted.

QuotaReport.description: Emitted whenever quota is recalculated, this may not represent a change in quota, simply the current value.
